actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require any person engaged in exploring, developing, refining, or transporting by pipeline, any petroleum product, natural gas or coal to provide certain information to the Comptroller.

summary.text: Requires any person engaged in exploring, developing, refining, or transporting by pipeline, any petroleum product, natural gas, or coal to provide certain information to the Comptroller, and for other purposes.

titles.title: A bill to require any person engaged in exploring, developing, refining, or transporting by pipeline, any petroleum product, natural gas or coal to provide certain information to the Comptroller.
